movie-description: Carlos Mencia is speaking his mind and taking no prisoners. Enter the Mind of Mencia and get ready for a merciless mix of up close stand-up, unconventional street interviews, and shocking commercial parodies.
movie-short-description: Created by Carlos Mencia, Robert Morton.  With Carlos Mencia, Brad Williams, Joseph Mencia, Norma Michaels. Carlos Mencia is speaking his mind and taking no prisoners. Enter the Mind of Mencia and get ready for a merciless mix of up close stand-up, unconventional street interviews, and shocking commercial parodies.
